name: Wilson Storage Tank Maintenance - Inspection Report
SCOPE - This Standard sets out requirements for the routine servicing (inspection, testing, preventive maintenance and survey) of Service systems and equipment

OBJECTIVE - The objective of this Standard is to maintain the reliability of Service systems and equipment such that they continue to meet the requirements of the approved design and are likely to do so until the next scheduled activity

APPLICATION - This Standard provides a systematic basis for minimum routine service applicable to Service systems and equipment. It also may be used to develop specific routine service requirements for systems or equipment that are part of an alternative solution. It requires evidence, in the form of records and reports of completion of the periodic inspection (including survey), testing and preventive maintenance activities required by this Standard
Wilson Plumbing & Drainage - Developed procedures for AS2304 compliance
– Focus is to inform on the state of the Tank and provide a comprehensive professional Report including a summary of findings and any recommended works that should becarried out
– External Inspection, highlighting defects and priority of maintenance requirements
– Digital photos and Full Comprehensive Report
Components to Inspect - Pass once Inspection completed
Inspect and complate all aspects as per the below, Add Comments/photos below as applicable
